summary: A talented girl is trying to find happiness amidst the Russian revolution of 1917 and the civil war that split the nation.
cast: Inna Churikova|Anatoliy Solonitsyn|Mikhail Gluzskiy|Mikhail Kononov|Mayya Bulgakova|Evgeniy Lebedev|Anatoli Marenich|Vladimir Kashpur|Vadim Beroev|Mikhail Kokshenov|F. Razumov|Stanislav Churkin|A. Gunina|Nikolay Kuzmin|Lyubov Malinovskaya|Vitaliy Matveev|Mikhail Mudrov|Nikolai Muravyov|A. Smolikov|Nikolay Surodin|Viktor Terekhov|Leonid Dyachkov|Aleksandr Khochinsky|Lyubov Tishchenko
title: V ogne broda net
